name: Paralland
description:
Welcome to PARALLAND!

In PARALLAND, you control a little guy who is trapped in a spell that makes the world flips between the normal dimension and the “paralland” one. The problem is that this new dimension is evil, full of bad creatures and traps.

You need to help the little guy to collect all the orbs stuck in Paralland in order to proceed to the portals and escape!

Controls
  • W, A, S, D - Move the Little Guy
  • Left Shift - Run
  • SPACE - Attack (if you can)
Extra Notes

This game was not only made from scratch in 72 hours, but also using my own custom game engine: Cave Engine. I took the time of the jam to also polish the engine and add countless new features (I’ve made 40 new commits to the engine’s source code since the jam started… LOL). So it was extra hard for me to manage to make the game and the art for it during this tight time period. I apologize for the extra simplicity of it, but I hope you understand the reasons. :)

Learn More!

If you are curious about the Game Engine (Cave), feel free to join our discord server to talk about it and also test the engine! You can talk about the game (and share YOURS over there as well). Join it here!

#LudumDare
